items.summary: Implement a backend reserve-matching mechanism that deterministically tracks (a) total outstanding issued credits and (b) BTC reserve available for on-chain broadcasts, and exposes a single source of truth for reserve coverage (no AI/LLM logic).

Fix credit-issuance reserve accounting so that a successfully verified credit purchase can mint credits even when the tracked reserve starts at 0, while still preserving the invariant that issued credits are 1:1 backed by tracked reserve after the purchase completes.

Enforce reserve-aware send/broadcast behavior: before creating or broadcasting a Send BTC transfer request, ensure there is sufficient tracked reserve coverage for the total on-chain spend (receiver amount + network fee), and keep reserve accounting consistent with broadcast outcomes.

Expose (or ensure the existing exposure of) a backend API that returns reserve status for admin UI consumption, including reserve BTC balance, outstanding issued credits, and coverage ratio, using clear English field naming and documentation comments.
